rpredictit 0.0.1

Format bid and ask market data with HTML

Source: R/market_data.R
format_market_data.Rd

Wrapper function to apply HTML formatting to PredictIt market data. Can be displayed in a shiny app, or standalone in an htmlwidget (e.g. DT::datatable).

format_market_data(data)

Arguments

data

PredictIt market data, of class data.frame or tibble, as returned by rpredictit::all_markets() or rpredictit::tweet_markets()

Examples

data <- all_markets()
format_market_data(data)
#> # A tibble: 1,096 x 11
